seo.title: Rand Medical Center | Work Injury & Auto Accident Doctors in Arlington Heights, IL
seo.description: Rand Medical Center provides comprehensive care for work injuries, auto accidents, pain management, orthopedics, physical therapy, and immediate care in Arlington Heights and the northwest Chicago suburbs.

hero.eyebrow: Work Injury • Auto Accidents • Pain Management
hero.title: Hurt at Work or in a Car Accident? We’ve Got Your Back.
hero.subtitle: From same-day appointments to on-site diagnostics, physical therapy, and detailed medical-legal documentation, Rand Medical Center makes it easier to heal and get your life back.

intro.heading: One Center for Injury Care, Rehab, and Ongoing Support
intro.body:
Rand Medical Center in Arlington Heights, IL focuses on one thing: helping injured people feel better, move better, and get back to work and everyday life safely.

We specialize in work injuries, motor vehicle accidents, and complex pain conditions. Our team includes pain management physicians, orthopedic surgeons, physical therapists, and advanced practice providers who work together under one roof.

Whether your injury happened on the job, on the road, or over time, we combine medical care, rehabilitation, and clear documentation so you’re supported medically and legally at every step.

sections.heading: Specialized Injury & Pain Services
sections.body: We don’t try to be everything to everyone. We focus on the conditions and injuries that cause people to lose work, sleep, and quality of life.

items.title: Work Injury & Workers’ Compensation Care
items.description: Immediate evaluation, treatment, and documentation for job-related injuries, with clear communication to employers and attorneys.

items.title: Auto Accident & Personal Injury Care
items.description: Whiplash, back pain, headaches, and more after a motor vehicle crash, with notes built to support your legal case.

items.title: Comprehensive Pain Management
items.description: Advanced injections, nerve blocks, and minimally invasive procedures to reduce pain and improve function.

items.title: Orthopedics & Surgery Center
items.description: Orthopedic consultation, fracture care, and outpatient procedures in a modern surgery center environment.

items.title: Physical Therapy & Rehabilitation
items.description: Personalized rehab programs for work injuries, auto accidents, sports injuries, and post-surgical recovery.

items.title: Immediate Care & Walk-In Clinic
items.description: Same-day visits for minor injuries, sudden pain, and urgent work-related incidents.

sections.heading: Why Patients, Employers, and Attorneys Choose Rand Medical Center

items.title: Injury-Focused
items.description: Our entire model is built around work injuries, auto accidents, and pain. We understand the medical and legal details that matter.

items.title: Coordinated Team
items.description: Physicians, orthopedists, physical therapists, and staff collaborate on your plan so care feels connected, not scattered.

items.title: Clear Documentation
items.description: We provide accurate, timely medical records and reports that help support your workers’ compensation or personal injury case.

items.title: Convenient Arlington Heights Location
items.description: Our clinic and surgery center are easy to reach from Arlington Heights, Mount Prospect, Palatine, Des Plaines, and surrounding suburbs.

sections.heading: Ready to Get Help for Your Injury?
sections.body: You don’t have to live with constant pain or confusion about what to do next. Our team will walk you through your options, from diagnosis to treatment and rehab.

faqs.question: Do I need an attorney before I see you?
faqs.answer: No. You can come to Rand Medical Center first for an evaluation. If you already have an attorney, we can coordinate with their office. If you do not, we can provide your records so you can seek legal guidance if needed.

faqs.question: Do you accept workers’ compensation and personal injury cases?
faqs.answer: Yes. We work with workers’ compensation carriers and personal injury cases on a lien basis. Our team is experienced with the paperwork, billing, and documentation these cases require.

faqs.question: Can I be seen quickly after an injury?
faqs.answer: In most cases, we can offer same-day or next-day appointments for new injuries, especially for work and auto accident cases. Call us and let our team know what happened.

seo.title: About Rand Medical Center
seo.description: Learn who we are, what we stand for, and how we care for injured patients, workers, and families throughout the northwest Chicago suburbs.

hero.title: About Rand Medical Center
hero.subtitle: Learn who we are, what we stand for, and how we care for injured patients, workers, and families throughout the northwest Chicago suburbs.

intro.heading: About Rand Medical Center
intro.body:
Rand Medical Center was created to solve a common problem: injured patients being bounced from clinic to clinic, repeating their story, and still not getting clear answers.

Our physicians, surgeons, and rehabilitation team work together in one coordinated center. We combine medical expertise, modern diagnostics, and compassionate support so patients feel heard, cared for, and guided—not rushed.

From the first phone call through final follow-up, we focus on communication, safety, and outcomes.

seo.title: Mission & Vision | Rand Medical Center
seo.description: Our mission is to provide focused, compassionate injury care that restores function, supports families, and respects the legal and workplace realities our patients face.

hero.title: Our Mission & Vision
hero.subtitle: Our mission is to provide focused, compassionate injury care that restores function, supports families, and respects the legal and workplace realities our patients face.

intro.heading: Our Mission & Vision
intro.body:
**Our Mission**  
To deliver safe, evidence-based injury and pain care that helps patients move better, feel better, and return to meaningful work and daily life.

**Our Vision**  
To be the trusted regional center for work injuries, auto accidents, and complex pain conditions—known for clinical excellence, clear communication, and coordinated care.

Every decision we make is guided by one question: *Is this in the best interest of the patient’s health and long-term function?*

seo.title: Facility Tour | Rand Medical Center
seo.description: Take a virtual tour of Rand Medical Center’s clinic, diagnostic areas, physical therapy gym, and outpatient surgery center in Arlington Heights, IL.

hero.title: Take a Look Inside Rand Medical Center
hero.subtitle: Take a virtual tour of Rand Medical Center’s clinic, diagnostic areas, physical therapy gym, and outpatient surgery center in Arlington Heights, IL.

intro.heading: Take a Look Inside Rand Medical Center
intro.body:
Rand Medical Center was designed to keep as much of your care as possible under one roof.

Our facility features comfortable waiting areas, private exam rooms, on-site diagnostics, a dedicated physical therapy gym, and access to an outpatient surgery center for advanced procedures.

Patients appreciate that they don’t have to drive all over the city for imaging, injections, and rehab—most services are available right here in Arlington Heights.

seo.title: Awards & Accreditations | Rand Medical Center
seo.description: Learn about the certifications, accreditations, and recognitions that demonstrate Rand Medical Center’s commitment to high-quality, safe, and ethical care.

hero.title: Awards, Accreditations & Quality Commitments
hero.subtitle: Learn about the certifications, accreditations, and recognitions that demonstrate Rand Medical Center’s commitment to high-quality, safe, and ethical care.

intro.heading: Awards, Accreditations & Quality Commitments
intro.body:
Rand Medical Center is committed to meeting and exceeding industry standards for safety, cleanliness, and ethical practice.

Our providers maintain board certifications and ongoing medical education. Our affiliated facilities and programs follow strict guidelines for infection control, documentation, and patient safety.

These recognitions are a reflection of the daily work our team does to put patient safety and quality of care first.

seo.title: Services | Rand Medical Center
seo.description: Explore all of the clinical services available at Rand Medical Center, including pain management, orthopedics, physical therapy, internal medicine, immediate care, and more.

hero.title: Clinical Services at Rand Medical Center
hero.subtitle: Explore all of the clinical services available at Rand Medical Center, including pain management, orthopedics, physical therapy, internal medicine, immediate care, and more.

intro.heading: Clinical Services at Rand Medical Center
intro.body:
Rand Medical Center brings together multiple specialties under one roof so you can receive coordinated care in one place.

From the moment you walk in, our goal is to understand what happened, how your pain affects your life, and what it will take to help you recover safely.

Browse our services to learn how we evaluate, treat, and support patients with injuries and pain.

seo.title: Pain Management | Rand Medical Center
seo.description: Rand Medical Center offers advanced pain management services and injection-based procedures to help reduce pain and improve function for patients with spine, joint, and nerve-related conditions.

hero.title: Pain Management Services
hero.subtitle: Rand Medical Center offers advanced pain management services and injection-based procedures to help reduce pain and improve function for patients with spine, joint, and nerve-related conditions.

intro.heading: Pain Management Services
intro.body:
Living with chronic pain can affect every part of your life—work, sleep, relationships, and mental health.

Our pain management team uses a combination of targeted injections, minimally invasive procedures, medications when appropriate, and rehabilitation to help reduce pain and restore function.

We focus on personalized plans that match your diagnosis, lifestyle, and goals.
